definition: to look for a bargain/to seek advantage/to try to gain at expense of others
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Don't try to cash in on me, or I'II beat you up.
sentences.chinese: 不要想在我身上討便宜，否則我就揍你。
